entity.description: Prime Minister of India Narendra Modi

text: @AmitShah Modi govt’s decision to provide ₹3 lakh cr collateral-free Automatic Loans to Businesses, including MSMEs, will surely help them meet their operational liabilities, built up due to COVID-19 and resume their business. About 45 lakh units and employees will benefit from this step.
